translations: n．中队：军队中的一个单位，通常由几个小队组成，尤指空军或海军的一个单位。
· The air force has several squadrons stationed at this base.
空军在这个基地驻扎了几个中队。

phrs.translation: 舰艇大队, 星际突击队, 中队, 装甲营
装甲兵团, 装甲团, 第五关装甲团
星际舰队, 星际护卫队

sentences.sentence: Short-range squadrons were attached to infantry corps and panzer divisions for this work .
sentences.translation: 为了这项工作，步兵部队和装甲师都配备了近程中队。

sentences.sentence: All three squadrons were flying the F-84F Thunderstreak.
sentences.translation: 三个中队都在驾驶 F-84F 雷击战机。

sentences.sentence: To their right stood Marsin's 40 French squadrons and 12 battalions.
sentences.translation: 在他们右边站着马尔森的40个法国中队和12个营。
